title: Am I the only one who thinks Abyssal Scepter is overpriced?
body:
I think it's not even worth the buy with the very little AP it gives you and the horrible scaling passive. It should not be costing more then Void Staff

I can't be the only one that thinks this way right?

replies.body: Well I already knew this. But abyssal is pretty fucking useless.

12 "magic pen" by level 9, 10% cdr, 60MR and 60 AP for 2750 is overpriced? You can't compare these stats to a voidstaff! It may give only 60 AP but the passive MR reduction gives you more damage, even more since you most likely rush this item and early flat pen is pretty good, not only that but 60 MR is quite a lot.

EDIT: just to add that it's one of the best items you can rush against AP Fizz, this will stop him from 100-0 you.

> EDIT: just to add that it's one of the best items you can rush against AP Fizz, _**this will stop him from 100-0 you.**_

http://memesvault.com/wp-content/uploads/Laughing-Hard-Meme-10.jpg
Well it'll stop him the first time at least.  Once he get's a kill or two though, you're pretty much doomed anyway.
It's one of the most commonly rushed items in midlane. It gives a bunch of damage and survivability in an ap vs ap matchup and it also serves as the best defense against an enemy mage that builds it.
Well they did add 10% cdr to it.  Though cdr is so abundant now that it doesn't seem to matter much.
